title: [files_sharing] problem with hook post_shared in lib/public/share.php
body:
in my installation with 5.0 with enabled users_sql with modufication to handle group:
with debug enabled there is a error in php error.log:

[27-mar-2013 12:00:33 utc] php notice:  undefined variable: uid in owncloud/lib/public/share.php on line 1148
[27-mar-2013 12:00:33 utc] php warning:  cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at owncloud/lib/public/share.php:1148) in owncloud/lib/json.php on line 108

this part looks like:

                        \oc_hook::emit('ocp\share', 'post_shared', array(
                                'itemtype' => $itemtype,
                                'itemsource' => $itemsource,
                                'itemtarget' => $groupitemtarget,
                                'parent' => $parent,
                                'sharetype' => $sharetype,
                                'sharewith' => $uid,
                                'uidowner' => $uidowner,
                                'permissions' => $permissions,
                                'filesource' => $filesource,
                                'filetarget' => $groupfiletarget,
                                'id' => $parent,
                                'token' => $token
                        ));

mentioned line is with sharewith. in this place uid is undeclared.
i've changed for sharewith['users'] but im not sure if this is correct.
before hook is a statement:
foreach ($sharewith['users'] as $uid) {

which ends just before emitting hook.

regards
ak
